name: Bennett
title: https://rerollcdn.com/GENSHIN/Characters/Bennett.png
description: A righteous and good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

normalattack.name: Strike of Fortune
normalattack.description: Perform up to five rapid strikes. When charged, releases two rapid strikes.

elementalskill.name: Passion Overload
elementalskill.description: Sword deals Pyro DMG. When held, does even more Pyro DMG.

elementalburst.name: Fantastic Voyage
elementalburst.description: Deals Pyro DMG to enemy and creates an Inspiration Field that slowly heals any party members at 70% or less.

passivetalent1.name: It Should Be Safe
passivetalent1.description: When dispatched to Mondstadt, time taken on the task reduces by 25%

passivetalent3.name: Fearnaught
passivetalent3.description: When inside an area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload CD is reduced by 50% and Bennet cannot take launch DMG.

constellations.d1: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increases no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% Base ATK.
constellations.d2: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus. Normal and Charged Attacks now do Pyro DMG.

profile.description:
The few young adventurers that the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild has always found themselves tangled up in baffling bouts of bad luck. He is the only active member of his own adventure group, known as "Benny's Adventure Team," after all the other members decided to "take leave" following a series of unfortunate incidents. As a result, the team is currently on the verge of being dissolved. Being unable to break the poor boy's heart, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild has kept "Benny's Adventure Team" on the books, whilst also hiding from him the fact that all the other members have long since officially left the team.
"Benny's Adventure Team" is a special case in the Adventurers' Guild, Mondstadt Branch. Initially, the team mechanism, requiring at least 3 to 4 regulars in the team, was set up to prompt mutual support and prevent accidents from happening. As for Bennett's "Benny's Adventure Team," its only regular member has always been Bennett himself. The lack of team members essentially has everything to do with Bennett's infamous  ad luck". However, being the passionate adventurer that he is, Bennett never feels lonely...Well, maybe once or twice, sometimes...

zhdescription: 蒙德的冒险家少年，拥有与他的善良毫不相称的霉运。

zhnormalattack.name: 好运剑
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击
进行至多五段的连续剑击。

重击
消耗一定体力，瞬间向前方挥出两剑。

zhelementalskill.name: 热情过载
zhelementalskill.description:
班尼特将火元素与冒险的热情凝聚在剑上。根据热情凝聚的程度，可能会发生不同的事情…

点按
快速向前挥出火焰一击。造成火元素伤害。

长按
根据长按时间进行蓄力，释放时依照蓄力段数造成不同的效果。
·一段蓄力：发动二段攻击，造成火元素伤害并将敌人击飞；
·二段蓄力：发动三段攻击，造成火元素伤害。最后一击会发生爆炸，将班尼特和敌人同时击飞。被击飞时，班尼特不会受到伤害。

zhelementalburst.name: 美妙旅程
zhelementalburst.description:
班尼特向敌人方向跳跃，进行一次下落攻击，造成火元素伤害，并生成鼓舞领域

鼓舞领域
·领域内的角色如果生命值低于或等于70％，会持续恢复生命值，回复量受益于班尼特的最大生命值；
·领域内的角色如果生命值高于70％，会基于班尼特的基础攻击力，以一定比例获得攻击力加成；
·为其中的角色施加火元素附着。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 热情复燃
zhpassivetalent1.description: 热情过载的冷却时间减少20%

zhpassivetalent2.name: 无畏的热血
zhpassivetalent2.description:
在美妙旅程领域内，热情过载具有如下效果：
·冷却时间减少50％。
·二段蓄力不会将班尼特自身击飞。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 应该安全
zhpassivetalent3.description: 在蒙德执行探索派遣任务时，消耗的时间缩短25%。

zhconstellations.d1: 美妙旅程的攻击力提升效果不再有血量限制，并且额外提升20％基础攻击力。
zhconstellations.d2: 生命值低于70％时，元素充能效率提高30％。
zhconstellations.d3: 热情过载的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d4: 施放一段蓄力的热情过载时，在技能第二段攻击中进行普通攻击，可以施放额外的追击。追击的伤害等同于第二段攻击的135%。
zhconstellations.d5: 美妙旅程的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d6: 处在美妙旅程领域内的单手剑、双手剑、长柄武器角色获得15％火元素伤害加成，并将普通攻击与重击伤害转为火元素。
